trans-unit.source: Specifies whether a column type is visible in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> designer.
trans-unit.target: 指定的資料行類型是否為可見中<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>設計工具。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: By default, types derived from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn> appear in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control-specific parts of the Visual Studio designer, but inherit a <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignTimeVisibleAttribute> of <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignTimeVisibleAttribute.No> to prevent them from appearing in other parts of the designer.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，類型衍生自<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>會出現在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項專屬組件的 Visual Studio 設計工具中，但繼承<xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignTimeVisibleAttribute>的<xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignTimeVisibleAttribute.No>，防止它們出現在設計工具的其他部分。</xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignTimeVisibleAttribute.No> </xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignTimeVisibleAttribute> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>

trans-unit.source: This is necessary because the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn> type implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent> interface, which normally makes an instance of the type appear in the designer.
trans-unit.target: 這是必要的因為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>型別會實作<xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent>介面，它通常使類型執行個體出現在設計工具。</xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>

trans-unit.source: Use this attribute to prevent a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn> type from appearing in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control-specific designer.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免使用這個屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>類型出現在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>特定控制項設計工具。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>

trans-unit.source: For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需屬性用法的詳細資訊，請參閱[屬性](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute"></xref> class using the default <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible*> property value of <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute"></xref>類別使用的預設<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible*>屬性值為<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute"></xref> class using the specified value to initialize the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible*> property.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute"></xref>類別使用指定的值來初始化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible*>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible*>

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible*> property.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible*>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible*>

trans-unit.source: The default <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute"></xref> value, which is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Yes"></xref>, indicating that the column is visible in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> designer.
trans-unit.target: 預設值<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute"></xref>值，這是<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Yes"> </xref>，指出資料行顯示在<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>設計工具。

trans-unit.source: This attribute instance has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible%2A> property value of `true`.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的執行個體具有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible%2A>屬性值為`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this object is equivalent to the specified object.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出這個物件是否等於指定的物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to compare with the current <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>要與目前<xref:System.Object>.</xref:System.Object>比較</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the specified object is a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute"></xref> instance with the same <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible*> property value as this instance; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>表示指定的物件為<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute"></xref>具有相同的執行個體<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible*>屬性值與這個執行個體; 否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible*>

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: 傳回這個執行個體的雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer hash code.
trans-unit.target: 32 位元帶正負號的整數雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this attribute instance is equal to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Default"></xref> attribute value.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出此屬性的執行個體是否等於<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Default"></xref>屬性值。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that this instance is equal to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Default"></xref> instance; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>表示這個執行個體是否等於<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Default"></xref>執行個體; 否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute"></xref> value indicating that the column is not visible in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> designer.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute"> </xref>值，指出資料行不顯示在<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>設計工具。

trans-unit.source: This attribute instance has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible%2A> property value of `false`.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的執行個體具有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible%2A>屬性值為`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the column type is visible in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> designer.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否顯示在資料行類型<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>設計工具。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the column type is visible in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> designer; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>表示資料行類型是顯示在<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>設計師，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute"></xref> value indicating that the column is visible in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> designer.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute"> </xref>值，指出資料行顯示在<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>設計工具。

trans-unit.source: This attribute instance has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible%2A> property value of `true`.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的執行個體具有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible%2A>屬性值為`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible%2A>
